definition: variant of 連接|连接[lian2 jie1]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: The assembly further comprises a test sensor being coupled to the sensor support.
sentences.chinese: 该组件另外包括与传感器支持物联接的检验传感器。

sentences.english: Please correctly connect the input connector clip of main power of the house.
sentences.chinese: 房体总电源进线插接件应正确联接。

sentences.english: Steps for allowing the Query and View Designer to create a self-join.
sentences.chinese: 让查询和视图设计器创建自联接的步骤。

sentences.english: TPC:It allows the spellcaster to telepathically contact someone that they know personally.
sentences.chinese: 它允许施法者通过心灵感应联接一个他本人认识的人。

sentences.english: These values mentioned above are also to be used for butt-joint welds.
sentences.chinese: 这些价值以上提到并且将被使用为接界联接焊接。

sentences.english: Remove the film, connect the electrical wire to the electrode with the clip.
sentences.chinese: 将防粘膜撕开，用导电线夹头与电极金属扣联接。

sentences.english: This function will enable the bonder to bond continuously the units.
sentences.chinese: 该功能将能够不断的把联接器单元邦起来。

sentences.english: The corotation ladder-shaped cover nut is enclasping central tube, and easy to realize rapid dismantling.
sentences.chinese: 正旋梯形螺母即抱紧中心管，实现快速联接和密封。

sentences.english: Especially, it is comparatively good that the model matches the non-linear performance of the synaptic connection.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是该模型较好地匹配了突触联接的非线性特性。

sentences.english: THE BOTTOM LINE Most studies have found that being left-handed does not increase the risk of migraines.
sentences.chinese: 下面联接到更多发现左撇子不增加偏头痛风险的研究。

sentences.english: Articulation refers to the degree of completeness for the solution the artifacts provide.
sentences.chinese: 联接性是指工件所提供的解决方案的完全程度。

sentences.english: The rigid jointer is replaced by the flexible jointer in a revolving system.
sentences.chinese: 用柔性联接器代替旋转系统各转子之间的刚性联接。

sentences.english: The rigid jointer is replaced by the flexible jointer in a revolving system.
sentences.chinese: 用柔性联接器代替旋转系统各转子之间的刚性联接。

sentences.english: The mechanism on hot set method for bit head and bit body of the shearers is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种截齿刀头和刀体之间的热固联接机理。

sentences.english: The two ends of the wire are connected to a split-ring commutator.
sentences.chinese: 导线的两端联接到裂环整流器。

sentences.english: The clunky lightsaber is connected to a power pack via the tube.
sentences.chinese: 他沉甸甸的光剑，通过管子，联接着电源组。

definition: to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
